title: 2010 By The Numbers limited edition typographic calendar
content:
Limited edition wall calendar featuring twelve original illustrations by Post Typography. Each month presents a different interpretation of the number "2010" through a wide variety of inventive, meditative, and eye-popping lettering treatments and illustrations. More fun than those other boring type calendars out there, and even non type/lettering nerds can appreciate it.

We've got fewer than 100 copies of this left... once they're gone that's it.

[http://www.posttypography.com/site/index.php?action=capital&id=795](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092355/http:/www.posttypography.com/site/index.php?action=capital&id=795)

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092355im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PostTypography_2010_calendar_big_4712.jpg)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092355/http:/www.posttypography.com/site/index.php?action=capital&id=795)

PS- Yes, we know the illustrations are not technically "typographic", but it's just easier to describe that way. Cool?
author: posttypo
